NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Patient Care and Cost or the cell corresponding to Clinics and Regulations?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Clinics} and {Regulations} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Medical Devices and Prevention or the cell corresponding to Public Health and Regulations?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Medical Devices} and {Prevention} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Insurance and Technology Adoption or the cell corresponding to Pharmaceuticals and Technology Adoption?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Insurance} and {Technology Adoption} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.57 to 0.71?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Medical Devices, Cost), (Medical Devices, Funding), (Medical Devices, Outcomes), (Medical Devices, Patient Satisfaction), (Medical Devices, Regulations), (Medical Devices, Technology Adoption)}.
